returns._0: Product current funding extrapolated to a daily rate

returns.productFees: fees accrued by the product owner

returns._0: sum of all fees accrued by the account
Whether or not the user's position eligible to be liquidated
Maximum of user maintenance, and maintenanceNext

params.positionSize: size of position for maintenance calculation

returns._0: Maintenance required for position in product
Product maker and taker position multiplied by latest price after settle
User's maker or taker position multiplied by latest price after settle

returns.amounts: Token amounts of unclaimed incentive rewards for given product
returns.tokens: Token addresses of unclaimed incentive rewards for given product

returns.amounts: Token amounts of unclaimed incentive rewards for given program IDs
returns.tokens: Token addresses of unclaimed incentive rewards for given program IDs

devdoc.title: Lens contract to conveniently pull protocol data

collateral(address).notice: Product total collateral amount after settle

collateral(address,address).notice: User collateral amount for product after settle

dailyRate(address).notice: Product funding extrapolated to a daily rate after settle

fees(address).notice: Fees accumulated by product and protocol treasuries after settle

fees(address,address[]).notice: Fees accumulated by treasury after settle

globalPosition(address).notice: Product pre-position and position after settle

liquidatable(address,address).notice: User liquidatble status for product after settle

maintenance(address,address).notice: User maintenance amount for product after settle

maintenanceRequired(address,address,uint.notice: User's maintenance required for position size in product after settle

name(address).notice: Returns the name of the provided `product`

openInterest(address).notice: Product total open interest after settle

openInterest(address,address).notice: User's open interest in product after settle

position(address,address).notice: User position for product after settle

pre(address,address).notice: User pre position for product after settle

price(address).notice: Current price of product after settle

priceAtVersion(address,uint256).notice: Current price of product at specified version after settle

pricesAtVersions(address,uint256[]).notice: Prices of product at specified versions after settle

shortfall(address).notice: Product total shortfall amount after settle

symbol(address).notice: Returns the symbol of the provided `product`

unclaimedIncentiveRewards(address,addres.notice: User's unclaimed rewards for all programs for product after settle
User's unclaimed rewards for provided programs for product after settle

userPosition(address,address).notice: User pre-position and position for product after settle

userdoc.notice: All functions should be called using `callStatic`
